original: Hetuñceva sahetukañca dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu ceva naahetuko ca dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
analyzed: hetum ca iva sa hetukañca dhammam paṭicca na hetu ca iva na ahetukaḥ ca dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā

original: Hetuñceva sahetukañca dhammaṁ paṭicca naahetuko ceva nanahetu ca dhammo uppajjati
analyzed: hetum ca iva sa hetukañca dhammam paṭicca na ahetukaḥ ca iva na na hetu ca dhammaḥ uppajjati

original: hetupaccayā. Hetuñceva sahetukañca dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu ceva naahetuko ca naahetuko
analyzed: hetu paccayā hetum ca iva sa hetukañca dhammam paṭicca na hetu ca iva na ahetukaḥ ca na ahetukaḥ

original: ceva nanahetu ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
analyzed: ca iva na na hetu ca dhammā uppajjanti hetu paccayā

original: Sahetukañceva na ca hetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naahetuko ceva nanahetu ca dhammo uppajjati
analyzed: sa hetukam ca iva na ca hetum dhammam paṭicca na ahetukaḥ ca iva na na hetu ca dhammo uppajjati

original: hetupaccayā. Sahetukañceva na ca hetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu ceva naahetuko ca dhammo
analyzed: hetu paccayā sa hetukam ca iva na ca hetum dhammam paṭicca na hetu ca iva na ahetukaḥ ca dhammo

original: uppajjati hetupaccayā. Sahetukañceva na ca hetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu ceva naahetuko
analyzed: uppajjati hetu paccayā sa hetukam ca iva na ca hetum dhammam paṭicca na hetu ca iva na ahetukaḥ

original: ca naahetuko ceva nanahetu ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
analyzed: ca na ahetuko ca iva na na hetu ca dhammā uppajjanti hetu paccayā

original: Hetuñceva sahetukañca sahetukañceva na ca hetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu ceva naahetuko
analyzed: hetum ca iva sa hetukam ca sa hetukam ca iva na ca hetum dhammam paṭicca na hetu ca iva na ahetukaḥ

original: ca dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Hetuñceva sahetukañca sahetukañceva na ca hetuñca
analyzed: ca dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā hetuñca iva sa hetukañca sa hetukañca iva na ca hetuñca

original: dhammaṁ paṭicca naahetuko ceva nanahetu ca dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Hetuñceva
analyzed: dhammam paṭicca na ahetukaḥ ca iva na na hetu ca dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā hetuñca ca

original: sahetukañca sahetukañceva na ca hetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu ceva naahetuko ca naahetuko
analyzed: sa hetukam ca sa hetukam ca iva na ca hetum dhammam paṭicca na hetu ca iva na ahetukaḥ ca na ahetukaḥ

original: ceva nanahetu ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: ca iva na na hetu ca dhammā uppajjanti hetu paccayā

original: Hetuyā nava …pe… avigate nava. (Sahajātavārampi …pe… pañhāvārampi vitthāretabbaṁ.)
analyzed: hetuyā nava pe avigate nava sahajāta vārampi pe pañhā vārampi vitthāretabba
